categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Oxixo was a Human male lieutenant who served as a TIE pilot in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. In 4 ABY, the Alliance to Restore the Republic's fleet attempted to attack and destroy the Galactic Empire's second Death Star superweapon during the Battle of Endor. Oxixo flew his TIE/LN starfighter to defend the battlestation from the Rebel starfighters. The battle ended in an Imperial defeat, along with the destruction of the Death Star. Oxixo had black hair, brown eyes, and light skin. An elite pilot, he had bravery, skill, and loyalty to the Empire. His chief goal was victory during the Battle of Endor. Oxixo knew he was deciding the galaxy's future during the battle, and did everything he could to complete his mission. He wielded an SE-14r light repeating blaster.
Oxixo was first mentioned and given an action figure in the "Battle Over Endor" set of 2010's Star Wars: The Vintage Collection.
